entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:21 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries or blizzard. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 70%
